main event: A civilian prisoner reported seeing a round, red object in St. Cloud, Minnesota on 28 July 1955.
interesting points: The object was the size of a nickel and was observed traveling west at a slow speed., The sighting lasted for seven to eight minutes., The object crossed a major portion of the sky in a straight course., The local flight conditions indicated a plane might have left Minneapolis for Fargo shortly before the sighting., The report suggests the object is probably an aircraft due to its flight path.
